nodes.text: Hobi Rann's Fine Imported Goods was a shop run by the Human Hobi Rann. It was located on Market Row, a commercial corridor in the Port Town district of the mining colony known as Cloud City, which floated in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin. The business was active at some point between the years 1 ABY and 3 ABY.

Hobi Rann's Fine Imported Goods first appeared in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. The shop is listed as a vendor players can purchase goods from, but no specific interactions are listed.
